subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: After years of struggle, the once-mighty Nascar team founded by Lee Petty and carried on by his son Richard and, now, his grandson Kyle, is showing signs that all the work is beginning to pay off.
snippet: After years of struggle, the once-mighty Nascar team founded by Lee Petty and carried on by his son Richard and, now, his grandson Kyle, is showing signs that all the work is beginning to pay off.
